description: Instructions to debug a Prometheus instance

options.content:
# Debugging Prometheus

## Prometheus ops-recipes

You can [search for prometheus in ops-recipes](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/search/?q=ops-recipes+prometheus) or [browse ops-recipes](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/).

The most useful recipes are:

* [Matching Number Of Prometheus And Cluster](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/matching-number-of-prometheus-and-cluster/) - when there's less prometheis than expected on a Management Cluster.
* [Prometheus agent remotewrite is failing](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/prometheus-agent-remote-write-failed/) - when agent can't send data to Prometheus.
* [Prometheus job scraping failure](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/prometheus-job-scraping-failure/) - when some targets can't be scraped.
* [Prometheus meta operator reconcile errors](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/pmo-reconcile-errors/) - when PMO fails to reconcile resources.
* [Prometheus OOM killed](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/prometheus-resource-limit-reached/) - when allocated resources are too short for Prometheus.
* [What to do if a volume has low disk space?](https://intranet.giantswarm.io/docs/support-and-ops/ops-recipes/low-disk-space/) - When prometheus PV gets full.

## Have a look at dashboards.

Here are the most interesting dashboards and their role.

### Prometheus

* **Prometheus**: Synthetic view for prometheus metrics
* **Prometheus / Remote Write**: see rates, errors and queues from agent to prometheus, and to grafana cloud.

### Kubernetes

Here you can see more detailed info concerning the pod or node running Prometheus.

Hint: You can see which node you pod is scheduled by looking at the pod's `.spec.nodeName`.

### VPA

VPA adjusts Prometheus' RAM/CPU requests/limits.

So looking at VPA dashboard can give some extra info.

(note: no VPA dashboard for the moment ðŸ˜¿)

### Ingress NGINX Controller

Data coming from agents (on all clusters) to Prometheus (on the MC) goes through the Ingress NGINX Controller.

Sometimes, this Ingress NGINX Controller is a problem and slows data down.

* **Ingress NGINX Controller** - select your cluster and your ingress (named `prometheus-xxx-remote-write`)
